name: Bravery: Rise of The Last Hero
description: Bravery: Rise of the Last Hero is an action-adventure RPG. Take an adventure in a world that needs a great hero capable of defeating the greatest challenges. Be this hero.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon X1900 (Integrated Video Cards not recommended) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX Series Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 series or ATI Radeon 6000 series or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
